text: @EUenergypricehikeThe recent ending of the Russia-Ukraine gas deal has raised concerns about a potential winter energy price hike in the EU. While it's good to see a reduction in Russian gas reliance, the unilateral tax on gas exports by Germany is complicating the possibility of swapping Russian imports for non-Russian supplies. Let's hope that the upcoming meeting of EU energy ministers in Brussels on Monday will help address this issue and provide more certainty in the pipeline.
